In… [+2092 chars]

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Disney Plus’ Hamilton trailer will transport you to the summer of 2016 - Polygon
articles.description: The first trailer for the Disney Plus recording of Hamilton dropped last night and it captures a moment frozen in the summer of 2016. Starring the original cast— including Lin-Manuel Miranda, Leslie Odom Jr., and Daveed Diggs — the recording drops on Disney P…
articles.content: May you always be satisfied
